alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 1:14AM AKST until December 26 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down power lines. Power outages may occur. Buildings could be damaged. Travel will be difficult.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
